sources.title: My World Dies Screaming
sources.description: Title: My World Dies Screaming Summary: A newlywed is terrified when her husband brings her to live in the old house that figures in her recurring nightmare. Directed by: Harold Daniels Actors: Production Company: Precon Process & Equipment Corporation Release Date: 1958 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 American-born Sheila Wayne has lived in Switzerland since childhood. Now newly married, she has a recurring nightmare about an ominous old house she can't recall having seen in waking life. Returning with husband Philip to Florida, they go to live at a country house...the house in her dream. Mysterious events multiply; who is responsible and why? Who is crazy? The answer is rooted in dark days of the past...

sources.title: My World Dies Screaming (1958) What haunts your dreams? Directed by Harold Daniels
sources.description:
What haunts your dreams may come home with you..
A newlywed woman is terrified when her husband brings her to live in the old house that appears in her recurring nightmare.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/pNunFbX2RUo


Original title: My World Dies Screaming (1958) 
Alternative titles: Terror in the Haunted House, Il mio mondo muore urlando, i mundo muere gritando, La mansión de los espectros

Director: Harold Daniels
Writer: Robert C. Dennis
Stars: Gerald Mohr, Cathy O'Donnell, William Ching
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Romance


00:00 Full movie
05:21 Sheila is plagued by nightmares of a mysterious house, seeks help from Dr. Forel
15:42 Sheila and her husband, Philip, visit the house from her dreams, unaware of its sinister history.
27:35 The couple discovers a dark family secret involving murder and madness.
38:12 Philip's true nature is revealed as he becomes increasingly obsessed with the house's dark past.
49:54 Sheila confronts Philip about his disturbing behavior and the house's evil influence.
1:02:15 A shocking revelation about the house's history and the fate of its previous inhabitants.
1:13:32 A tense confrontation between Philip and the caretaker of the house, Jonah.
1:25:09 Sheila uncovers the truth about Philip's family and their involvement in the house's dark legacy.
1:36:41 A shocking climax as Philip's true intentions are revealed, leading to a tragic conclusion.


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
